description: It does not work on kali linux at all.
summary: Does not work on kali linux

description:
The UI is awful! To read parts of it you need to go in and change the theme so that text becomes visible - everytime you launch it!
You cannot add a new password.
You cannot search for passwords.
You cannot export your password database.
The only time you would use this is if your Nextcloud was innaccessible.

When started, it Opens an Invisible Window and throws some errors:

(nextcloud_password_client:2): Gdk-CRITICAL **: 01:08:39.418: gdk_window_get_state: assertion 'GDK_IS_WINDOW (window)' failed
libEGL warning: wayland-egl: could not open /dev/dri/renderD128 (No such file or directory)
MESA: error: ZINK: failed to choose pdev
libEGL warning: egl: failed to create dri2 screen

** (nextcloud_password_client:2): WARNING **: 01:08:39.598: libsecret_error: \u0008\xc0V\xfd\u0007

** (nextcloud_password_client:2): WARNING **: 01:09:04.579: atk-bridge: get_device_events_reply: unknown signature

Ubuntu 22.04 with KDE Plasma
Programmes found in Start Menu but clicking does not start the programme.
How to start it from CLI?
Where are the logs?
Приложение на федоре не работает. Падает с ошибкой nextcloud_password_client: error while loading shared libraries: libjsoncpp.so.1: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
